verses.verse: And <S%H87>Abram<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H802>he<s%>, and his wife, and all that he <S%H3876>had<s%>, and Lot with <S%H5045>him<s%>, into the south.
And <S%H87>Abram<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3513>rich<s%> in <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, in <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and in <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And he <S%H3212>went<s%> on his <S%H4550>journeys<s%> from the <S%H5045>south<s%> even to <S%H1008>Beth<s%>–el, unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> where his <S%H168>tent<s%> had <S%H1961>been<s%> at the <S%H8462>beginning<s%>, between <S%H1008>Beth<s%>–el and <S%H5857>Hai<s%>;

Unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, which he had <S%H6213>made<s%> there at the <S%H7223>first<s%>: and there <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H1980>also<s%>, which went <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>, had <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, and <S%H1241>herds<s%>, and <S%H168>tents<s%>.

And the <S%H776>land<s%> was not able to <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H3427>them<s%>, that they might live <S%H3162>together<s%>: for their <S%H7399>substance<s%> was <S%H7227>great<s%>, so that they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

And there was <S%H7379>strife<s%> between the <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> of <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and the <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%>'s <S%H4735>cattle<s%>: and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> then in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3876>Lot<s%>, Let there <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H4808>strife<s%>, I pray <S%H7462>you<s%>, between me and you, and between my herdsmen and your <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%>; for <S%H582>we<s%> are <S%H251>brothers<s%>.

Is not the whole <S%H776>land<s%> before <S%H6440>you<s%>? Separate <S%H6504>yourself<s%>, I ask <S%H8040>you<s%>, from me: if you will take the left hand, then I will go to the <S%H3231>right<s%>; or if you depart to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, then I will go to the <S%H8041>left<s%>.

And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> all the <S%H3603>plain<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, that it was well <S%H4945>watered<s%> every <S%H6440>where<s%>, before the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>, even as the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, like the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, as you <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>.

Then <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> him all the <S%H3603>plain<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>; and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> <S%H6924>east<s%>: and they separated <S%H6504>themselves<s%> the <S%H376>one<s%> from the <S%H251>other<s%>.

<S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3603>plain<s%>, and pitched his <S%H167>tent<s%> <S%H5704>toward<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>.
But the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> were <S%H7451>wicked<s%> and <S%H2400>sinners<s%> before the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H87>Abram<s%>, <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H3876>Lot<s%> was <S%H6504>separated<s%> from <S%H5375>him<s%>, Lift up now your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>look<s%> from the <S%H4725>place<s%> where you are <S%H6828>northward<s%>, and <S%H5045>southward<s%>, and <S%H6924>eastward<s%>, and <S%H3220>westward<s%>:
For all the <S%H776>land<s%> which you <S%H7200>see<s%>, to you will I give <S%H5414>it<s%>, and to your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: so <S%H834>that<s%> if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H4487>number<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, then shall your <S%H2233>seed<s%> also be <S%H4487>numbered<s%>.
<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, <S%H1980>walk<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> in the <S%H753>length<s%> of it and in the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H5414>it<s%>; for I will give it unto you.

Then <S%H87>Abram<s%> removed his <S%H167>tent<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H436>plain<s%> of <S%H4471>Mamre<s%>, which is in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, and <S%H1129>built<s%> there a <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
